string.value: This is your first assignment as an informant. You're hopeful that this time #p1012111# of #b#m100000000##k has found the cause of the #o1210102#s' strange change in behavior. You'd better go talk to #b#p1012111##k.

#p1012111# says that #ra cynical group of #o1210102##ks was seen hanging around #m100000000#. He thinks they may have influenced the regular #o1210102#s as well. He then instructs you to eliminate #r50 #o9300274#s#k and give him #banything you find that might be considered odd#k...

#o9300274##r #a217111##k
#i4032315# #t4032315# #b#c4032315# / 1#k
You eliminated the #o9300274# and brought back the #t4032315# for #p1012111#. He found it unusual and asked you to wait while he gives it a detailed analysis.

I came across some startling news while investigating the #o1210102#s near #m100000000#. Apparently, there's a group of #o1210102#s that have a completely different personality! We're talking about #r#o1210102#s that have turned cynical...#k. Maybe they're why the rest of the #o1210102#s are also starting to change.

It must be related, so I want you to look into the #o9300274#s. Eliminate about #r50 #o9300274#s#k and #bgather anything you find that seems strange and bring it to me#k. I hear that there is something we should be looking out for…
#o9300274#s can usually be found to the right of #m100000000#, at a field #bnear the east hill of #m100000000##k. I guess you'll need to venture a little deeper into the east hill. Good luck.
Hmmm…will that be too hard for you? Take some time to think it over, and let me know.
So you must have defeated the #o9300274#s. Did you find anything strange? Hmmm? Is that…a puppet? Please show me.
This puppet… Something doesn't seem right. I better look into it. Please wait for a bit.

Still short on defeating #r50 #o9300274#s#k? I need you to eliminate them and #bgather up anything strange you might find and give it to me#k. I heard that a #bpuppet#k might be found, but I am not sure. I just overheard #p1103001# talking about it.

Still short on defeating #r50 #o9300274#s#k? I need you to eliminate them and #bgather up anything strange you might find and give it to me#k. I heard that a #bpuppet#k might be found, but I am not sure. I just overheard #p1103001# talking about it.
